channel.title: Nutmeg: A drug
channel.description:
http://www.erowid.org/plants/nutmeg/nutmeg_basics.shtml
http://www.erowid.org/experiences/exp.php?ID=15836
After reading that... i decided to try it... whatever you do, don't try to take a tablespoon at once with a gulp of water.. You will puke before you swallow it.
I had a little left and i mixed it with yogurt... probably am not gonna get effect... but then again im 100 pounds... and havent eaten much lately.

item.title: Nutmeg: A drug
item.dc:creator: @SonGoku SonGoku
item.description:
@SonGoku wrote:

Tbh i dont like Nutmeg. Takes too long

Read full topic

item.title: Nutmeg: A drug
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:12, topic:202336”]I’ve tried this. I bought whole nuts and crushed them. I think I consumed around 5 nuts. On the day I tried it, I went with a group of friends and did everything I could. It may have been psychosomatic but I definitely felt GOOD and POWERFUL! It’s a great high but kicks your ass on the following 2 days cause you feel hung over, lazy, and tired. But the high makes you feel like you’re very stoned. Music sounds good, you feel good, you feel strong. At my peak, I found it hard to walk though.

Definitely an interesting experience, but I wouldn’t recommend taking it very often.

To jme. Everyone has a different experience with this drug. No one actually ‘trips’ but it does have a powerful effect.

To ninjanub. Use www.erowid.org - Best website ever on drugs.[/quote]

Thanks, but you misunderstood. I don’t use drugs though :P. But I’ll read it over, because I’m bound to end up doing drugs one way or another. Good to know some information about the drugs before using it, as a precautionary.

EDIT: Haha, they classified tea there. Since it is a stimulant. I drink black tea all the time :). Gives you tons of energy.

Read full topic

item.title: Nutmeg: A drug
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Generally, when someone says “it may have been psychosomatic”, I consider it a drug not worth trying

Read full topic

item.title: Nutmeg: A drug
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I’ve tried this. I bought whole nuts and crushed them. I think I consumed around 5 nuts. On the day I tried it, I went with a group of friends and did everything I could. It may have been psychosomatic but I definitely felt GOOD and POWERFUL! It’s a great high but kicks your ass on the following 2 days cause you feel hung over, lazy, and tired. But the high makes you feel like you’re very stoned. Music sounds good, you feel good, you feel strong. At my peak, I found it hard to walk though.

Definitely an interesting experience, but I wouldn’t recommend taking it very often.

To jme. Everyone has a different experience with this drug. No one actually ‘trips’ but it does have a powerful effect.

To ninjanub. Use www.erowid.org - Best website ever on drugs.

Read full topic

item.title: Nutmeg: A drug
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

Yeah true. But there are always idiots out there who will not know.

And we all know most people don’t use google… We must spread the use of Google! We’ll be like, Gazis or something.

Read full topic

item.title: Nutmeg: A drug
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“ninja nub, post:9, topic:202336”][quote author=jme link=topic=267057.msg2206117#msg2206117 date=1209450400]

Guys, this is really dangerous!

No joke. My mom’s friend’s sons died from it. It’s really dangerous. Your body goes into comas and shit.

You are right that it is very dangerous.

It’s extremely hard on the liver, and quite easy to over dose on. I really don’t know if it’s true, but they say it’s like binge drinking for a week.
[/quote]

Not sure. All I know is that no one should EVER try this. It’s isn’t worth your life.[/quote]

Well, it’s very easy to use it safely. I mean if you spend like 20 minutes researching it, no lives will be lost.

Read full topic

item.title: Nutmeg: A drug
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Chimaera God, post:5, topic:202336”][quote author=Cruzer link=topic=267057.msg2205561#msg2205561 date=1209284392]

Not worth it at all.

It’s just some shitty delariant that doesn’t work half of the time, and feels like complete crap. Also it takes like 7 hours to kick in.

I did it with the fresh whole nutmegs (which I then crushed), exactly how you said lol. And I think I tried doing some more by putting it in oatmeal, which was even worse. I would think if you mix it into food or drinks, its going to be worse because it’s like you have to drink or eat a larger volume of disgusting horrid shit.

Better then smoking paper?
[/quote]

LMAO, why would somebody smoke paper in the first place. There’s no point to it…[/quote]

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic
